EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Attunity/Wellcare_Q215.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Register Now: Pivotal Customer Spotlight Webinar with WellCare and Attunity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/healthcare-success-story-wellcare> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
In this webinar, speakers from WellCare, Attunity and Pivotal will discuss how WellCare uses Attunity Replicate <http://www.attunity.com/products/attunity-replicate> to offload data quickly and easily from its SQL Server and Oracle systems into Pivotal Greenplum Database <https://pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-greenplum-database> to support real-time reporting and analytics.
Attend <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/healthcare-success-story-wellcare> this session to learn about:
- Big data challenges and opportunities for healthcare providers - Increasing reporting speeds to improve healthcare analytics - Enabling a real-time data initiative for big data success - Incorporating Hadoop into an existing EDW environment to achieve a successful data lake - Implementing the joint solution of Attunity and Pivotal Big Data Suite <https://pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite> to enable significant optimizations in your EDW environment
With the help of Attunity and Pivotal, WellCare has successfully enabled real-time reporting and analytics to gain a competitive edge. Join us <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/healthcare-success-story-wellcare>on June 30th and discover how your organization can achieve similar success!
Thanks, The Pivotal Team CUSTOMER SPOTLIGHT WEBINAR TUESDAY JUNE 30, 2015 10AM PDT REGISTER <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/healthcare-success-story-wellcare>
